summary: Frontend Developer with strong skills in building clean, responsive, and high-performance web applications. Passionate about modern UI, smooth user experience, and writing maintainable, scalable code. Proven ability to convert ideas into polished products while optimizing performance and accessibility.

listOfWorkExperiences.description: Developing modern, responsive web applications using React, Next.js, and TypeScript. Implemented reusable components, improved page performance by 30%, and collaborated with designers to ensure pixel-perfect UI. Worked closely with backend teams to integrate REST APIs and deliver scalable production features.

Built and maintained UI components using JavaScript, React, and Tailwind CSS. Assisted in developing dashboard interfaces, improved accessibility scores, and fixed UI bugs, reducing user-reported issues by 25%.

listOfProjects.description: Designed and developed a sleek, minimal personal portfolio using Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Implemented smooth animations, responsive layouts, and optimized the site for SEO and Core Web Vitals.
